siri:SummaryContent.siri:SummaryText: The Neuchâtel, St-Honoré stop is closed.

siri:ReasonContent.siri:ReasonText: This is due to construction work.

siri:SummaryContent.siri:SummaryText: The Neuchâtel, Ste-Hélène stop has been moved.

siri:ReasonContent.siri:ReasonText: This is due to construction work.

siri:ConsequenceContent.siri:ConsequenceText: Due to construction work, the stop Neuchatel , Ste-Hèléne towards Neuchâtel, Place Pury will be moved 170 metres after the usual stop , for more information you can visit our website WWW.transn.ch.
